replies.author: 502mc
replies.txt_content:
具体方法：下载MySQL压缩包 解压 将目录内的my-default.ini文件复制一份为my.ini，修改其中内容为：
# *** DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE. It's a template which will be copied to the

# *** default location during install, and will be replaced if you

# *** upgrade to a newer version of MySQL.

[client]

default-character-set=utf8

port=3306

[mysqld]

port=3306

character_set_server=utf8

basedir ="你的MySQL目录"

datadir ="你的MySQL目录/data/"

tmpdir ="你的MySQL目录/data/"

socket ="你的MySQL目录/data/mysql.sock"

log-error="你的MySQL目录/data/mysql_error.log"

character_set_server=utf8

#server_id = 2

#skip-locking

max_connections=200

table_open_cache=256

query_cache_size=1M

tmp_table_size=32M

thread_cache_size=8

innodb_data_home_dir="你的MySQL目录\data"

innodb_flush_log_at_trx_commit =1

innodb_log_buffer_size=128M

innodb_buffer_pool_size=3G

innodb_log_file_size=10M

innodb_thread_concurrency=16

innodb-autoextend-increment=1000

join_buffer_size = 512M

sort_buffer_size = 32M

read_rnd_buffer_size = 32M

max_allowed_packet = 32M

explicit_defaults_for_timestamp=true

#sql-mode="STRICT_TRANS_TABLES,NO_AUTO_CREATE_USER,NO_ENGINE_SUBSTITUTION"

sql_mode=NO_ENGINE_SUBSTITUTION,STRICT_TRANS_TABLES
，然后打开cmd 切换到你的MySQL目录，输入mysqld --initialize-insecure
然后发现目录内出现了data文件夹，然后输入mysqld install安装系统服务。
最后输入net start mysql 启动服务
然后打开cmd 切换到你的MySQL目录输入mysql -uroot -p随便填一个 然后回车
连接成功！

然后输入UPDATE user SET authentication_string = PASSWORD('新密码') WHERE user = 'root';
     FLUSH PRIVILEGES;
修改密码 大功告成。
